001package apprepo;
002import java.sql.Connection;
003import java.sql.DriverManager;
004import java.sql.PreparedStatement;
005import java.sql.ResultSet;
006import java.sql.SQLException;
007import java.sql.Statement;
008import java.util.ArrayList;
009import java.util.List;
010
011
012public class AppDao {
013        
014        public static Connection getConnection() {
015                String url = "jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/rentapplications";
016        String user = "customer";
017        String password = "password";
018        Connection connection = null;
019        // Load and register MySQL JDBC driver
020        try {
021            Class.forName("com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver");
022        } catch (ClassNotFoundException e) {
023            System.out.println("MySQL JDBC driver not found.");
024            e.printStackTrace();
025            return null;
026        }
027
028        // Establish the connection
029        try {
030                
031            connection = DriverManager.getConnection(url, user, password);
032            if (connection != null) {
033                System.out.println("Connected to the database!");
034                
035            }
036        } catch (SQLException e) {
037            System.out.println("Database connection error.");
038            e.printStackTrace();
039        }
040        return connection;
041        }
042        
043        public static boolean addRecord(Application app) {
044                boolean ret = false;
045                int rowsAffected =0;
046                
047        PreparedStatement pstmt = null;
048    //    String sql = "INSERT INTO your_table_name (column1, column2, column3) VALUES (?, ?, ?)";
049        
050        String sql = "INSERT INTO appinfo (Name, Description, Organization, Platforms, Links, Price) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)";
051
052        
053        Connection connection = null;
054        try {
055                
056                connection = getConnection();
057         
058         // Execute query and get results
059            pstmt = connection.prepareStatement(sql);
060            pstmt.setString(1,app.getName());
061            pstmt.setString(2,app.getDescription());
062            pstmt.setString(3,app.getOrganization());
063            pstmt.setString(4,app.getPlatforms());
064            pstmt.setString(5,app.getLinks().toString());
065            pstmt.setString(6,app.getPrice());
066            
067         // Executing the INSERT statement
068            rowsAffected = pstmt.executeUpdate();
069          //  System.out.println("Rows inserted: " + rowsAffected);
070       //     connection.commit();
071           
072        }
073        catch(Exception e) {
074                e.printStackTrace();
075        }
076      /*  if(rowsAffected >0 ) {
077                ret = true;
078        } */
079        return true; 
080                
081        }
082        public static List<Application> getAppData() throws ClassNotFoundException {
083        
084                        // JDBC URL, username, and password of MySQL server
085                        // Note: Update with your actual database URL, username, and password
086                      /*  String url = "jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/rentapplications";
087                        String user = "customer";
088                        String password = "password"; */
089                        Statement statement = null;
090                        ResultSet resultSet = null;
091                        Connection connection = null;
092                        List<Application> applications = new ArrayList<>();
093                        // Load and register MySQL JDBC driver
094                       /*     try {
095                            Class.forName("com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver");
096                        } catch (ClassNotFoundException e) {
097                            System.out.println("MySQL JDBC driver not found.");
098                            e.printStackTrace();
099                            return null;
100                        } */
101
102                        // Establish the connection
103                        try {
104                                
105                                connection = getConnection();
106                            statement = connection.createStatement();
107
108                            // Define SQL query
109                            String query = "SELECT * FROM rentapplications.appinfo";
110
111                            // Execute query and get results
112                            resultSet = statement.executeQuery(query);
113                            
114                         
115                            // Process the results
116                            while (resultSet.next()) {
117                                Application app = new Application();
118                                
119                              //  int id = resultSet.getInt("id");
120                              //  String name = resultSet.getString("Name");
121                                app.setName(resultSet.getString("Name"));
122                                app.setDescription(resultSet.getString("Description"));
123                                app.setOrganization(resultSet.getString("Organization"));
124                                app.setPlatforms(resultSet.getString("Platforms"));
125                                String linksStr = resultSet.getString("Links");
126                                String[] linksArray = linksStr.substring(1, linksStr.length() - 1).split(", ");
127                            app.setLinks(linksArray);
128                            app.setPrice(resultSet.getString("Price"));
129                            applications.add(app);
130                                // Print the results
131                              //  System.out.println("ID: " + id + ", Name: " + name);
132                            }
133
134                        } catch (SQLException e) {
135                            System.out.println("Database connection error.");
136                            e.printStackTrace();
137                        } finally {
138                            // Clean up resources
139                            try {
140                                if (resultSet != null) resultSet.close();
141                                if (statement != null) statement.close();
142                                if (connection != null) connection.close();
143                            } catch (SQLException e) {
144                                e.printStackTrace();
145                            }
146
147                    }
148                    return applications;
149        }       
150
151}
